tool.name: Extract variant fragments

param.name: input
param.label: Select alignment for which to extract variants

param.name: insert_reference
param.label: Select a reference. If a variant aligns against this reference it will be retained

tool.help: Extract variants will find soft-clipped alignments and alignments with insertions, and, if the inserted sequence aligns with the selected reference, write out a the alignment, but clip the aligned portion of the read to a single N and will add 2 tags, AR and AD to the alignment. The AR tag will list the contig, the AD tag contains detailed information on how the insert/clipped sequence aligned against the selected reference.
